Class ec.ui.InspectorView 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----ec.ui.InspectorView
public class InspectorView
extends View
implements WindowOwner
Class for displaying values in an Inspector (see ec.inspect.Inspector) in an IFC view.

The InspectorView displays the name, type and current value of all the inspector fields. The user can update the value of the field (unless it is of type OBJECT). The fields are displayed in a scrolling area.

Known Bug: IFC text fields don't let you type "." (period). This is a show stopper when entering floating point numbers, we need to add a workaround
